thread.section_title: Park Plaza Victoria London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfortable stay
thread.title_full: Comfortable stay - Review of Park Plaza Victoria London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Nishant B
title: Comfortable stay
text:
Stayed at this property on the weekend for one night with my girl friend... excellent location , good quality rooms, Bar offerings were great, impeccable service .... overall a truly hassle free stay with top notch service. Special thanks to Lena for booking us in and as promised by her we had an unforgettable experience. Without a doubt I will return and this hotel will be on top of my list when visiting London next time.
Thanks
N.B
